entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:29 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning near noon then changing to flurries at times heavy this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
